description.value:
[Heroic]

Prerequisites: Tier 3 with the Grand Archive

Cost: 4 Fame

Effect: Desperate moments call for keen insight. You can Recall Knowledge as a free action, rolling the skill check twice and using the better result. This is a fortune effect.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Arcana)]{Recall Knowledge (Arcana)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Crafting)]{Recall Knowledge (Crafting)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Lore)]{Recall Knowledge (Lore)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Medicine)]{Recall Knowledge (Medicine)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Nature)]{Recall Knowledge (Nature)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Occultism)]{Recall Knowledge (Occultism)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Religion)]{Recall Knowledge (Religion)}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Recall Knowledge (Society)]{Recall Knowledge (Society)}
